summary: This is an email chain from August 10, 2020, discussing coordination regarding the Epstein claim fund. It mentions a call with Epstein's estate representatives about victim assistance and documentation requests for claim applications.

persons.name: Epstein
persons.role: Deceased financier, subject of claim fund
persons.context: The email discusses the 'Epstein claim fund' and coordination with his estate regarding victim assistance and documentation.

events.title: Call regarding Epstein claim fund
events.description: A call took place with representatives of Epstein's estate to discuss victim assistance and documentation requests for claim applications.

keyFacts: The email discusses coordination related to the Epstein claim fund and victim assistance.
A call occurred on August 10, 2020, with Epstein's estate representatives regarding documentation for claim applications.
The communication involves planning for follow-up discussions about victim statements and letters for the applications.
